actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to establish a minimum pension of $600 for veterans of a period of war who have permanent and total non-service-connected disabilities and who are entitled to receive pension and for the surviving spouses of such veterans who are entitled to receive pension.

summary.text: Establishes a minimum pension of $600 for veterans of a period of war who have permanent and total non-service-connected disabilities and who are entitled to receive a pension and for the surviving spouses of such veterans entitled to receive pensions. Amends the Veterans' and Survivors' Pension Improvement Act of 1978 to increase the minimum pension payable under such Act.
